basics.summary: I am a passionate and ambitious developer who wants to help companies grow through the use of novel and innovative technologies. While I have recently graduated with a bachelor of mechanical engineering, I have discovered an affinity for programming and am excited to work in the world of web development. Most of my work experience is in the hospitality industry, where I have greatly developed skills in customer service, interpersonal communication and teamwork.
